JUST A QUICK NOTE FROM THE AUTHOR

I’m starting to run low on ideas.
Now usually I just wright as I would read, you know like make it up as I go along,
Well that works well for a little while, then I find I have left the primary point for the story in the first place.
Witch I believe was a middle-aged woman gone crazy with the loss of her child, that for some strange reason got granted supernatural powers.
Now as a plot that doesn’t give me a lot to work with so I am asking for my six faithful readers (yes there are other people reading this) to give me their opinion and more importantly their ideas as to where day two will take, Emily, Stephany and their slightly deranged but otherwise loving mother Kelly.
Just use this branch of the story to have your say.
Thanks for your support.

AKA the dark mind behind this branch of story.

1423211122211112.title: get you dressed

choices: Kelly focuses on her daughter Emily
Kelly exacts revenge on her ex-husband.
14233.content:
"Wait." Kelly said, stopping in her tracks and staring at the mirror that showed her daughter, "There's something far more important that I need to do first."

Kelly had been away from her daughter for years. Decades even, when her ex had filed for divorce and successfully stolen custody of Emily from her and had proceeded to make her life a living hell that she had endured only because she had lacked the 'courage' to end it all. Instead she had carried on with the mockery that her life had become, trudging and toiling day after day hoping that her life would get better, that she'd be able to see her daughter again. To be a mother once more. But she knew that those days were long past; Emily was an adult now and had long been poisoned by her father's lies, and Kelly's own downward spirals doing little to improve the image of her mother as a complete and total failure.

But now, she could fix that. She could fix everything.

With a wave of her hand a thought, Kelly's body tightened and shifted as the years slid away and the damage her addictions had caused vanished like dust in the wind until coming to a halt at twenty-three years old.The energy of youth boiled and churned within her body and Kelly felt truly alive for the first time since...she couldn't even remember when. But that was only the start of her plans as she pulsed another change through reality, her worn down apartment in the city folding in on itself, dirty walls and cheap furniture collapsing into nothingness before folding back outwards again; this time as an immaculate, expensive home overlooking settled amongst rich green foliage as the shimmering blue ocean lapped gently at a golden sand beach in the near distance. Even her clothing changed from a standard, somewhat threadbare business suit to elegant yet functional housewear that looked and felt on her youthful body as though it was made of the finest silks and threads. As the changes concluded bird song and a warm breeze filled the house and Kelly took a moment to be thoroughly awed at it all. But she quickly pushed aside her reverie. There was work to be done still.

"And now to make sure that I never need to work again!" Kelly proclaimed "There is several billion dollars of legally gained money sitting in a highly secure vault, as well as lucrative, sound investments on the markets!" She said excitedly, and though she saw no immediate change to her new surroundings she could feel the power pulsing as it worked, creating bank accounts filled with cash.

"Good. Now, for the most important part..."
14233.title: A Little Self-Improvement.

choices: Kelly decides to force Emily to love her, with unintended consequences

142331.content:
Kelly turned to the floating mirror, her excitement turning to determined resolve as she gazed upon her daughter's adult face.

"Oh, Emily..." Kelly whispered, and slid a slender hand across her daughters face in the mirror. From here, Kelly saw that her recent changes had not affected her daughter, who was still studiously focused on her college class, her face furrowed in effort as she took notes and listened to whatever her instructor was saying beyond the mirror's range of vision. Kelly felt once more the pang of sadness and anger that had come from being pushed away from her daughter's life. But now she could fix it.

But how? Even if Kelly were to go to her daughter at this instance, willing herself to Emily's location via her newfound power, the reunion would not go well. Kelly was a stranger to her daughter, one that was built around lies and deceits backed up by Kelly's own poor life choices. There was no relationship there, and Kelly appearing would only cause her daughter to move further away from her, even if she recognized her mother, who was now as old as she was. No, the only way that she would ever repair her relationship with her daughter was through her powers, these glorious, godly things that had placed KElly into paradise.

There were two options that Kelly could think of, as she took a seat in a luxuriously comfortable recliner on a balcony that overlooked the ocean, the mirror gliding along with her silently. First, she could simply will her daughter into loving her, to manipulate her entire soul to where, despite everything, Emily loved her mother and wanted to have a relationship with her. But that particular option seemed...wrong to Kelly. For one, there was the who;e 'same age as her' problem, and secondly, as real as it would be for everyone else, Kelly was unsure about forcing her daughter to love her. It felt, strange in the light of recent events though it may be, as cheating. But it was the fast option with immediate success, save for being the same age.

The second option seemed far more appealing to Kelly, though it would effectively erase the Emily that existed now. The thought of making Emily younger excited Kelly, though was she really ready for the amount of effort that was required in raising a child? And what kind of mother would she be? She was effectively trading one child for another, one who would be entirely different from the Emily that existed now, if she chose to fully wipe her daughter's memories as she was regressed. But it would be a second chance to fix everything, to make it how it should have been...

Kelly furrowed her brow and pulsed a wine glass made of crystal and filled with delicious looking white wine into existence, taking a slow drink as she pondered her daughter's fate to the sounds of bird song and waves.
142331.title: Rebuilding a Relationship

1423311.content:
"To hell with it, I want my daughter back and I want her back now!" Kelly growled, and focused her mind and powers on her daughter. "I want Emily to love me as she should, and to think nothing of us being the same age. I want to be with Emily immediately!" Kelly closed her eyes and let the power building within her do it's work.

Everything changed. The breeze vanished in an instant, along with the feeling of warmth. She felt her body changing, shifting positions and weight, her clothes changing from the immaculate silk to course threads. Something slim slid into her fingers as the wine glass vanished from her other hand, which shifted to lay on a cold, hard surface. Subtle changes flowed across her body as the sounds of paradise faded and were instead replaced with the sound of an older man speaking on the subject of theoretical physics, and the hum of flourescent lighting.

Kelly opened her eyes and was taken aback at the changes. Gone was the mansion in paradise, and instead she was sitting in a lecture hall, the same lecture hall that Emily was in! Cautiously, Kelly turned to her left and felt chills flash through her body. Emily was right there, her gaze focused on the old man at the front of the room, her own slender hands taking detailed notes, her attention fully on her work. Kelly was ecstatic; her daughter was closer to her than she had ever been allowed to be in decades! It took all of Kelly's strength not to start crying, instead she focused her attention back on the professor, which only lasted a few moments before complete and utter boredom of the topic forced Kelly to inspect herself and the changes that had occurred.

Without a mirror, there was no real way to see the full extent of her changes, and Kelly did not feel like she should totally interrupt the class just to see what had to be minor changes. Instead she noticed her clothes were rather generic once again, though still eye friendly and seemed something that befitted her youthful body. HEer skin tone seemed somewhat darker and her breasts somewhat larger, though Kelly wrote these changes off as a college girl tan and the magic simply helping her fit in moreA phone sat off to the side of a large textbook that her former wine glass hand was now holding, her fingernails done up in a very pale blue that seemed to match her top. Her new breasts stuck out a bit more and she had noticiable cleavage, though it wasn't embarassingly so. All in all, the changes to herself had been minor, though Kelly's excitement was only slightly tempered by the apparent loss of her wealth and home in paradise.

"Oh well" She though to herself, "Nothing I can't fix later anyway..."

Kelly did her best to ignore the temptation to change reality further until the professor FINALLY dismissed the class. As the many other young adults stood, collecting their things and moving towards the door, KElly finally had her chance to get a reaction out of Emily. Turning to her daughter, Kelly felt herself getting emotional as she greeted her daughter for the first time in forever.

"Emily...I can't believe it's you. It's been so long!" Kelly said, eyes watering as she placed a hand on her daughter's shoulder.

"Emily fixed Kelly with a strange look and said...

14233111.content:
"What are you talking about, sis? It's not as though we, you know, live in the same dorm and go to all the same classes. You literally see me all day!" Emily shot her mother a strange look and went back to packing her things into a sturdy looking backpack as confusion filled Kelly's mind.

"Sis? What did she mean by that?" She thought to herself. "Magic, tell me what she meant by that!"

As her powers pulsed, new memories filled Kelly's mind. Instead of being her mother, Kelly was now Emily's twin sister, both of which were estranged from their mother and hadn't seen in years due to her lies and deceits and her self destructive addictions. Kelly's ex-husband was now her father, and she felt a strange sense of love for the man that had destroyed her previous life, as any daughter should for her daddy.

Kelly shook her head. No, she HATED him. She ruined her life...but at the same time, these new memories felt warm and comforting, as well as the newfound sisterly love and fond memories that she now had of Emily.

"This...this isn't right" Kelly muttered under her breath.

"Sis, you better hurry, we have to get to out next class across campus. Are you feeling okay?" Emily asked, her voice filled with concern as her sister seemed lost and confused.

Kelly blinked back the tears in her eyes and gave Emily a small smile "I'm fine, just give me a moment..."
14233111.title: "What are you talking about, sis?"

1423312.content:
"Now, I can't force my daughter to love me. Not this way, anyway" Kelly said. "Besides...I missed out on so much of her life...This way I can get to experience those moments with her the way it should have been."

It was true. Kelly had been forced out of her daughter's life before Emily had turned ten years old, and even before then the relationship had been strained by her then husband's constant verbal and mental abuse. Kelly had loved her daughter but there had just been no way to build a loving, tender relationship in the toxic environment her ex-husband had created. And then the few visitations Kelly had been allowed to have before further legal action had stripped her daughter away from her entirely were little more than tense sessions of trying to explain why mommy didn't live with her anymore, sessions that were not nearly long enough and always ended in tears for both of them.

"No, this is the only way..." Kelly said, pulling herself out of her sad reverie and focusing on her daughter once more, "Magic, I want my daughter to become three years old, that she lives with me and that her father is not in the picture. I want to give her the life she should have had, not the one she was given"

And Kelly's power pulsed through her. In the mirror, Kelly could see her daughter rapidly growing younger, her body shrinking and growing more and more youthful as the scenery around her changed as well. From a college lecture hall, to a high school classroom, then middle school. Then elementary. Then preschool. Finally the changes stopped as Emily was seated in the middle of a colorful preschool classroom, her face round and slightly pudgy with baby fat, her clothes having gone through a gamut of changes from young adult fashion, to teeny bopper, to finally settling on a adorable little outfit with a cartoon pony on it, and her hair had gone from lavishly styled to simply a long braid of golden brown hair that flowed down her back.

Emily's young face was wide with shock for a moment before Kelly waved her waved, "No, I want my daughter her with me now!"

And with a pulse of power and a flash of light, Emily vanished from the mirror and appeared snugly beside Kelly in the large chair. Kelly was overjoyed! Her daughter, her true daughter was with her, finally. She couldn't help herself, she leaned down and pulled the pint sized Emily in for a long hug and a gentle kiss on the forehead, warm salty tears flowing freely from Kelly's eyes as her most dearly held dream came true. After a few moments, Kelly let her daughter go and wiped the nonstop cascade of tears from her eyes as Emily looked up at her and said...

14233121.content:
"Mommy, what's wrong" Emily asked in the sweetest voice Kelly had ever heard. She wiped her tears away and gave her daughter one more tight squeeze.

"Oh nothing, my little darling, mommy is just so happy you're her perfect little girl" And Kelly meant every word of it. So far this power had let her fix everything in her life, to let her reach for her dearest dream and make it true once more. Her daughter was hers again, to love, to raise, to make happy until the end of time!

"Oh" Emily responded with a smile. "Can I get a cookie?" It was clear the magic had truly reverted her daughter from a young adult all the way to a toddler, erasing who was there and replacing it with an almost completely blank slate for Kelly to mold however she chose. With a gentle smile, Kelly nodded, "Yes baby, you can have a cookie"

"Ok thank you mommy!" Emily giggled and gave her mother the biggest hug her tiny body could manage, and the two of them walked inside the massive house, Kelly somehow knowing the way to the kitchen. It filled her heart with joy as Emily babbled to herself, singing random words to the tune of one of the songs from Moana and running a few steps ahead, giggling and leaping over imaginary creatures that only her young eyes could see. When they finally reached the kitchen (along with it's full staff which were clearly prpearing some form of meal for the two, though one was very quick to retrieve a cookie and give it to Emily) a cloud crossed Kelly's good mood.

She had everything she wanted, except complete and total revenge against the man who ruined her life. As she made sure Emily thanked the cook who gave her the cookie and made their way to the huge playroom that was filled with age appropriate toys, Kelly decided to get the last part of what she perceived as justice against her ex...
14233121.title: Days of Innocence and Cookies

14233122.content:
"Who are you and why am I a little girl!?" Emily shrieked, untangling herself from Kelly and making a short scamper across the marbled balcony, putting as much distance between herself and the strange young woman that had been holding her. The last few moments had been a blur, in one she had been in her physics class in college, and then suddenly she was in a loud, noisy playroom surrounded by little kids and toys as a little girl! 15333.content: Marge Planter is an 21 year old electronics wizz, right out of university. Knowledgeable in computers, electronincs, radio engineering and all sorts of related technical knowledge. Her course in IT finished last week and... the job that WAS lined up dropped without warning. It had been such a sure thing that she had counted on it. Now she's broke, on social security, and struggling to find another job. She doesn't think it should be too hard. IT is one of the fields that hasn't been hit too hard by the downturn, but so far she hasn't had any luck and is starting to get depressed!
15333.title: Marge Planter.

153331.content:
Marge stared out of the window into another dreary, rainy day as she chased sauce around her plate with the last slice of Pizza. The last week her choices in diet had reduced somewhat and she was finding it difficult to pay her bills. Right now she was idly considering focusing on rice dishes to save on cash. She was pretty sure she'd seen a decent wok in a yard sale yesterday...

*BAMPH!*

The flash of light and sudden gust of air behind her knocked Marge from her chair, tumbling to the floor. Gasping, struggling to get her breath back from the sudden shock, she rolled over to see what had caused the ruckus behind her.

Behind her was a... robot. It was around five foot tall, looking like a robotic replica of a woman, full detail too, but steel outside. It's lips weren't mobile but more like a dummy's, just two bumps on the jaws that hinged. The hair looked like wire, the arms seemed almost like bundles of cables and fibers covered in muscle shaped molded steel covers to imitate the shape of a person. It looked very intricately made but... very fake, not even trying to make you think it WAS a human. She'd seen some remote control robots in Japan that looked more life-like than this... but where did it come from? Glancing down she saw there was a burn mark on the floor, spreading out in a star pattern from where the robot stood. It exploded into existence?

"Er... hello?" She managed weakly, finding herself shaking suddenly and not sure what part of this was getting to her. The unknown? The robot itself? The explosion? Maybe more to the point that someone had done all this to her! There was no way this was some sort of accident!

The head turned to her smoothly, eyes looking rather realistic, compared to the rest of it's face... then it made a liar out of her analysis as it smiled. She had been sure that face couldn't do that from the way it looked... wait, she could see flickering. It's mouth was some sort of display? LEDs or LCDs or something? Weird.

"Greetings. I am A.A.R.A.U. (Ambulatory Autonomous Reality Alteration Unit)." It said in a melodious, low voice. It pronounced it's name 'Arrow'. "I bring greetings from my creator who hopes you will fare better with my gifts than she did."

Marge stared. Reality Alteration? Oh no, seriously? This has to be a dream, right?

"Um, creator? Who made you?"

Arrow blinked and smiled softly again at her.

"Marge Planter."

OK, not what she expected!

"What? What do you mean? That's.... me."

"Incorrect. You are an earlier version of Marge Planter in the timeline. I was created by Professor Planter aged 68 at her private laboratory in Houston Texas."

Houston? Why on Earth would she move to Texas? California was just fine for her.

"You're capable of time travel?"

"Incorrect. This unit is severely limited in scope and Professor Planter built a specialized unit to transport me to your time. Current date should be 2012, August 17th, 5:07 PM Pacific Standard Time. Is this correct?"

Marge glanced over the robot's shoulder to the wall and saw the clock tick over to 5:08

"Close enough."

"Data is set. Parameters have been stabilized. Ownership has been transferred to Marge Planter aged 21, unemployed. Warning, this unit is considered a lethal weapon under United States Law. Use of this unit to harm a lawful sapient is covered under section 32 of the New Intelligence Charter. Alteration of sapients without consent is considered an act of rape under United States Law." Then the voice changed subtly in timber and sounded a little more human "Also, note to my younger self from older self. Go nuts girl! The cops won't even know this is possible for twenty years! And probably not even then if you don't invent the damn thing and mass produce it! Hah!" The voice then switched back to it's former, softer, but slightly less emotional tone "This unit is a class 12 reality adjustment unit capable of mass transfer, localized physical alteration and energy state fluctuation. Data parameters require quantum state lock after each use to avoid reality breakdown within this unit's core matrix. Length of state lock depends on complexity and mass involved. Note, mass cannot be created or destroyed with this unit but may be transferred between two objects that are in physical contact with each other. Maximum mass affected or transferred is 625lb in a single use. Physical pattern alteration will require either Design alteration using neural control custom design software or copying of an existing pattern scanned by this unit or a pattern already stored in the data matrix of this unit. Design alteration should not be attempted without suitable training. Attempting to do so may have unpredictable results. All reality alterations are limited to objects so designated as subjects to that alteration. Maximum range is fourteen meters from this unit. This unit cannot designate itself as a subject. Material substances between this unit and subject do not hinder alteration. Are there any questions?"

Marge gaped. That huge, long diatribe had been without pause or break of any kind. A human would have run out of breath long before she finished!

She had a reality alteration robot... with limitations, but still! A robotic genie!

"Wait, you said there is a pause for... quantum state lock... after each use? Roughly how long are these pauses?"

"Quantum state lock duration varies depending on how complex a change is being attempted and how much mass is involved."

Marge pondered for a moment.

"OK, just as an example, if I were to... oh I dunno... turn myself into a guy, how long would the delay last?"

"Changing gender is a only a level 3 change in physical attribute of a living being. Body mass of 122lbs is well within the limits of this unit. Duration of Quantum State Lock is..."
153331.title: Marge Planter. Tech girl.

Arrow... or maybe Future Marge recording though Arrow... paused, making a very real sounding sigh.

"Right now things are pretty bad, tension everywhere, and it's worse on the personal front. Up until last year R.A was pretty much big business only. Now it's starting to be available to the average Joe and things are getting ugly. Law courts going nuts, riots forming, people evading anything they want by changing who they are... and forgetting what they did. It's a mess! I've designed a special field generator that will create a self sustaining Reality Adjustment bubble that will keep progressing outwards in a sphere at 100 times the speed of light, permanently altering reality so low level reality units can't function. Here all large scale manufacturing, especially of advanced Reality Alteration tech, uses Reality alteration instead of physical construction techniques. If reality is altered so low level R.A.s won't work, no-one will ever be able to invent the stuff, and never be able to build the more advanced ones... or at least not until humanity gets advanced Nano-tech going, and by then they'll probably be more able to use this stuff! If you get it working AARAU will be the only R.A unit in existence... possibly for centuries. Make good use of her, OK? She can't build the Field Generator to fix reality herself, but she can build machines that will enable you to build it. Please do so, this world is just falling apart! Take care and good luck!"

"Holy fuck! I don't do things by halves do I?"

"I only have information on the other Marge Planter. I do not have information on your methodology, rationalization, or types of cognition. Since the time stream has been altered that version of Marge Planter no longer exists. On a side note I have been given exact co-ordinates for her temporal schism mechanism. The area should be free of all living material at 12:15 PM July 22nd 2060 for a sphere with a diameter of 225 meters. All particles within that sphere will instantly raise temperature to 197 degrees Celsius from the effects of the temporal Schism mechanism activating, even though alterations to the time line will mean the device itself will never be built."

George's wife Maggie had moved from California to the east coast, somewhere in New Jersey, taking their 14-year old daughter Rachel with her.

It just made him so mad. He loved his family, but his ex-wife could be such a bitch sometimes, just too controlling. She made it almost impossible to be married to her. Yet, he loved her anyway. If only there was a way to get his family back and make things how they were at the beginning, back when Maggie wasn't such a controlling bitch.

------

One day, later that week, George was testing some software for his automotive company when something very odd flashed across the computer screen.

YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN THE ABILITY TO ALTER REALITY HOWEVER YOU WISH. ENJOY.

Then it was gone.

"What the hell?"

Of course, he thought it was just a joke, but later that day, he made a comment to someone at the company that he was getting a raise, just a joke, as he really wasn't (although he really did want one), and it happened! His supervisor gave him a raise just a few minutes later. Thinking that there might have been something to this reality altering thing, he decided to use it for something he wanted more than anything: to fix his family.

Thinking it must have worked, he turned towards the other side of the bed and saw Maggie, asleep. He raised his hands up in the air, and whispered (so he wouldn't wake her up) "Yes, it worked!"

But something was wrong. When he thrust his arms up, something shifted on his chest. Wobbled, is what it really felt like. And now that he noticed it, his whole body felt different. He put his hand under the covers and felt his body. His waist was a narrower than it should have been, his butt was more plump, and ... when he touched his crotch, his eyes went wide. "What the hell happened to my cock?!" he yelled, not feeling it where it should have been. Then he got another shock. His voice wasn't his own. Instead, it was the voice of a woman.

Maggie stirred awake and looked panicked towards George. "Gigi? What is it? What's wrong?"

Gigi?

George knew his divorce was caused by Maggie's increasing bitchiness towards him, but he never understood where it was coming from. He had no idea that the reason she was feeling more and more irritated by their marriage was because she was in fact a lesbian. At the start of their marriage, she had tried to make it work, even going as far as having sex to have a baby (Rachel), but the more time that went on, the more she couldn't stand being married to a man. And she finally divorced him. But not once had she ever let on that she was homosexual.

So when George changed reality so that he and his family could be together again, one big happy family ... well, Maggie would never be happy being married to a man, that was already proven. So to make it all work, reality was changed so that George was a woman named Gigi instead. And it made Maggie and Gigi a married lesbian couple.

But if George was a lesbian married to another lesbian, then what happened to his daughter Rachel?
15511121.title: Maggie Was Secretly a Lesbian

choices: George and Maggie Share the Same Body, Like a Split Personality Sort of Thing
155111221.content:
One moment, George was sitting in his apartment, around nine o'clock that night, then the next, he found himself in an unknown bed, in an unfamiliar room. Thinking it must have worked, he turned towards the other side of the bed, expecting to see Maggie. But she wasn't there. He looked at the clock, seeing that it was just past midnight (remember that New Jersey is three hours later than California), and he knew that Maggie usually went to bed around eleven. So where was she?

He got out of bed and immediately felt that something was wrong. It was dark, so he made his way over to the light switch. He grew more and more disturbed with every step. Why did he feel so weird? It felt like there was a weight on his chest that shouldn't have been there, and overall he felt a lot lighter, despite the weight on his chest. What was going on?

Once he flipped on the light switch, he looked at himself in the bedroom mirror and got the shock of his life. He was Maggie! No wonder it felt weird to walk around. He had the body of a woman!

But ... if he was in Maggie's body, what happened to Maggie?
155111221.title: George Finds Himself In Maggie's Body

1551112211.content:
Back at his apartment in California, all George did was think over and over again that he wanted to be with his wife again. He never meant that he wanted to be his wife.

As it turned out, what was happening was that George and Maggie now shared the same body, sort of like a split personality. When Maggie was asleep, George was in full control of her body. And when Maggie was awake, George's control of her body was pushed to the side and Maggie was in full control of her body, no matter if George was awake or not.

This was not what he wanted. But fortunately for him, he had the power to fix this. All he needed to do was alter reality again. So with that, he concentrated and tried to change things so that he no longer had Maggie's body, but had his own instead.
1551112211.title: George and Maggie Share the Same Body

choices: Yeah, He Lost His Power ... He'll Just Have to Cope With His Strange Situation
15511122112.content: George began to panic. It wasn't working. Had he lost his power? If he had, did that mean that he was stuck in his ex-wife's body for the rest of his life? He collapsed onto the bed and dropped his head into his hands (or rather, Maggie's head into her hands) and wept. He didn't want to a woman - Maggie or anyone else. He just wanted his life back.
15511122112.title: It Doesn't Work

choices: George Tries to Get Used to Having Maggie's Body ... Later, Maggie Wakes Up
155111221122.content:
As it turned out, George hadn't lost his power to alter reality. It had just been reduced by half, that's all. Since he was now only half of a person's mind (Maggie being the other half), the other half of the mind would have to complete the change in reality. So after Maggie wakes up and takes control of her body. a reality change will happen, but it will be a combination of what George was trying to make happen and what Maggie inadvertently tries to make happen. George may know about his power to alter reality, but Maggie doesn't. And without any control over Maggie's actions when she's awake, George would be unable to stop her from causing a reality change based on the combined desires of both of them.

Who knew how reality could change when that happened?
155111221122.title: Half a Mind Means Half the Power to Change Reality

YOU HAVE BEEN GIVEN THE ABILITY TO ALTER REALITY HOWEVER YOU WISH. ENJOY.

He was concentrating on what he remembered when his relation to Maggie was still intact and they enjoyed time with Rachel here in California and the long sandy beaches where the wheatear was always fine… Then he made his wish: “I wish I could get close to my wife and daughter again”
